name: PING (itch) (sweeyee3)
description:
PING is a local multiplayer shooting game where players move by teleporting to their bullet. It supports up to 4 players and uses only one button to shoot and move.

Q, Z, P, M: shoot and teleport to bullet location

Left and Right arrow key: Switch maps

Enter: Start game

Esc: Quit game / play

* If your character does not shoot after a match, try refreshing your browser and restarting the application. This is a known bug

The year is 2018. Net Neutrality is dead.
The public outcry against the regulation of network traffic goes unheard.
In response, hackers began developing bots to secure bandwidth for themselves, the organisations they represent or the members of the public.
Little did they know they created something else...

An ecosystem of bots living in the network, with no purpose other than to eliminate all others and take control of the Worldwide Web (WWW).
You are one of those bots...
And this is your story...
